title: Bug with Sejuani
body: So basically just did a ranked game, but during that ranked when I flashed over the wall where Grump is located and he was spawned, I got stuck there until I had to Q out. I literally couldn't move, weirdest bug and lost me a kill, sad life.

replies.body:
Can you recreate it?
Also, he probably just blocked you.
Also, just tried, can't recreate it

My guess is given that the model for Sejuani is slightly larger then most (look Bristle needs to lay off the poro snacks if his gonna be eatting all the kills Sejuani gets with her 57% win rate) and i would guess that she'd struggle to go around Gromp and if she flashed slightly inside of gromp it'd probably stick the model slightly more then most other champs.
Shouldn't be able to block me though? I think anyways, considering I flashed ontop of him not behind
